Summary: Not human visitor visitors. I have been visited by aliens for quite some time. Aliens of many sorts because they believe me to be a star seed with advanced abilities
divs: Sighting Details This has been going on since 2001. My kids, and I have been followed thru two states by different aliens some human looking, draconian with wings. White reptoid, greys, human looking blonds, dark reptoids, ghostly type. men in black. They have been doing experiments on me to advance my abilities to complete a mission of importance. That would connect to ishtar, isis, and jesus, and god. Since I have the capability to have a long memory I have the power to control mind control against our visitors. My mission is of great importance to planet earth. I am the reincarnation of a connection to one of our godly visitors. I have the sould of what seems to be of a highly advanced extraterrestrial. They come to me every day. I do not drink, smoke, or take drugs. Have not done any narcotics at all. I have met my human looking alien father in the flesh once, and three times thru high tech methods.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around February 22nd 2006
